examples: Realistic DSLR photograph of anthropomorphic Penkingese dog enjoying a bowl of ramen on the Great Wall of China with the words "Seedream 5.0 Lite available on fal" visible at the top.
prompt.description: The text prompt used to generate the image
prompt.title: Prompt

num_images.title: Num Images
num_images.description: Number of separate model generations to be run with the prompt.

image_size.description: The size of the generated image. Total pixels must be between 2560x1440 and 3072x3072. In case the image size does not fall within these parameters, the image size will be adjusted to by scaling.
image_size.title: Image Size

max_images.title: Max Images
max_images.description: If set to a number greater than one, enables multi-image generation. The model will potentially return up to `max_images` images every generation, and in total, `num_images` generations will be carried out. In total, the number of images generated will be between `num_images` and `max_images*num_images`.

enhance_prompt_mode.description: The mode to use for enhancing prompt enhancement. Standard mode provides higher quality results but takes longer to generate. Fast mode provides average quality results but takes less time to generate.
enhance_prompt_mode.title: Enhance Prompt Mode

sync_mode.description: If `True`, the media will be returned as a data URI and the output data won't be available in the request history.
sync_mode.title: Sync Mode

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker

seed.description: Random seed to control the stochasticity of image generation.
seed.title: Seed

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the generated image.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the generated image.

height.description: The height of the image in pixels.
height.title: Height

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.
width.title: Width
